column4: End-to-end authentication<ref group=lower-alpha name="end-to-end-authentication">End-to-end authentication protects communications from man-in-the-middle attacks by the service provider.</ref>

column1: Jitsi<ref group=lower-alpha name="sip-encryption">Only if the user has registered with a compatible SIP provider. Some SIP providers do not support certain encryption protocols.</ref>

column9: <ref group="lower-alpha" name="threema-forward-secrecy">Only on the network connection  not on the end-to-end layer.</ref><ref name="threema-whitepaper" />

column3: <ref group=lower-alpha name="encryption-open">Only the encryption related source code is open.</ref><ref name="whatsapp-ows" />
